attributes.action: 292 buses to turn their engines off while stationary at rossington ave, bwood
attributes.additional_details: TFL who rent the bus route to metroline are doing absolutely nothing about these issues, WE NEED CHANGE AND CLEAN HEALTH
attributes.background: Rossington ave /Wetherby road residents need some help with fumes and noise coming off the busses, leaving  their engines running while stationary. Causing more pollution , this is no good for our environment  and health

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for TfL and the Mayor of London.
